CustomField.description: If populated, the product adjustment will only be applied to the desired product added by the action specified here. If not populated, all occurances of the desired product will be adjusted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If populated, the product adjustment will only be applied to the desired product added by the action specified here. If not populated, all occurances of the desired product will be adjusted.
CustomField.label: Product Adjustment Target Rule Action
